title: Add home page and exercise library management

requirements.text: Create a home page as the landing route ("/") with navigation to the main sections: Exercise Library, Workouts, Log Weight, and Progress
acceptanceCriteria: Home page is accessible at the root route "/"
Navigation to Exercise Library, Workouts, Log Weight, and Progress sections is present
Page follows the existing dark theme styling with red accents

requirements.text: Add functionality to create new exercises in the exercise library with fields for name, equipment type, and muscle group

quotes: allow me to edit, add, and delete exercises to the exercise library

acceptanceCriteria: User can add a new exercise through a form with name, equipment, and muscle group inputs
New exercise is persisted in the backend
Exercise library updates to show the new exercise immediately after creation

requirements.text: Add functionality to edit existing exercises in the exercise library, allowing updates to name, equipment type, and muscle group

quotes: allow me to edit, add, and delete exercises to the exercise library

acceptanceCriteria: User can edit an existing exercise's details
Changes are persisted in the backend
Exercise library reflects the updated information immediately

requirements.text: Add functionality to delete exercises from the exercise library

quotes: allow me to edit, add, and delete exercises to the exercise library

acceptanceCriteria: User can delete an exercise from the library
Deletion is persisted in the backend
Exercise is removed from the library view immediately
Confirmation prompt is shown before deletion

requirements.text: Add 'Full Body' as a valid muscle group option in the backend MuscleGroup type and include it in all muscle group selections

quotes: Add full body to muscle group

acceptanceCriteria: MuscleGroup type includes 'Full Body' as a valid option
Full Body appears in muscle group filters and dropdowns
Exercises can be assigned to the Full Body muscle group

requirements.text: Add Treadmill, Assault Bike, Bike, and Stairmaster as valid equipment options in the backend EquipmentType and include them in all equipment selections

quotes: Add treadmill, assault bike, bike and Stairmaster to equipment

acceptanceCriteria: EquipmentType includes Treadmill, Assault Bike, Bike, and Stairmaster as valid options
New equipment types appear in equipment filters and dropdowns
Exercises can be assigned to the new equipment types

constraints: Follow existing dark theme with red accent colors
Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Changing the overall application structure or routing setup beyond adding the home page
Modifying the weight logging or progress tracking features
Adding user authentication or multi-user support
Changing the workout creation and management features
